name: mri_brainvol_stats
description: Tool for computing brain volume statistics with FreeSurfer

inputs.description: The subject ID for which brain volume statistics are computed
inputs.name: Subject

inputs.description: XML string containing input data. The XML is used to define additional parameters for computation.
inputs.name: XML String Input

inputs.description: Flag to specify that surface-based measurements should not be included in the output.
inputs.name: Exclude Surface Calculations

inputs.description: Flag to include segmentation information in the brain volume calculations.
inputs.name: Include Segmentation

inputs.description: Output file path to write the brain volume statistics.
inputs.name: Output File

author: FreeSurfer Developers
